# Copilot Agents

Entrypoints for workspace agents live here for Copilot Chat discovery.

- Agent: Concierge (only)
- Location: `.github/agents/Concierge.md`
- Deep context: `/context`, `/specs`, `/docs`, `/.copilot/context`
- Logs: `docs/logs/`
- Legacy/first-run helper: [.github/agents/WelcomingParty.md](agents/WelcomingParty.md)

See `docs/agents.md` for human-facing index and invocation examples.
